snippet: Froome rode solo to win a rain-swept mountain stage at the Tour of Romandie, and Nairo Quintana retained the overall lead with one day left.
abstract: Chris Froome wins fourth stage of Tour of Romandie bicycle race in Switzerland; Nairo Quintana retains overall lead.
lead_paragraph: Froome rode solo to win a rain-swept mountain stage at the Tour of Romandie, and Nairo Quintana retained the overall lead with one day left.
